mapper.select: select major_sort from user_major_agency where user_account=#{user_account}
mapper.update: update user_info set user_password=#{user_password}, user_grade=#{user_grade}, user_address=#{user_address}, user_sex=#{user_sex}, user_degree=#{user_degree} where user_account=#{user_account}
mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_account, user_password, user_grade, user_address, user_sex, user_degree) values (#{user_account}, #{user_password}, #{user_grade}, #{user_address}, #{user_sex}, #{user_degree})
